This is an error that appears in the browser e.g. in localhost:8000 during local deployment. This must be a bug in paths or whatever because it worked a minute ago.
I was not happy to see that the "runtime error test script" within dev.sh does not catch that. maybe inspect the content of the returned HTML by keywords like "ServerError".

Further, run then the `dev.sh test` routine which should include the runtime test, and work until the test passes i.e. the GUI and the graph / forcefield combination works as desired.

Output:

Server Error
TypeError: __webpack_require__.a is not a function

This error happened while generating the page. Any console logs will be displayed in the terminal window.
